backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining label, user, and print job types with access control, user profiles, print job submission, and serial duplication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two logo‑related frontend features to AppShell.tsx with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend source file paths to concise descriptions of each file’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in ErrorBoundary and PasswordSessionProvider and routes between LockScreen and AppShell based on session state.
frontend/src/audio/soundSystem.ts: Zustand‑based sound settings store with Web Audio beeps for success, error, and print completion events.
frontend/src/auth/passwordSession.ts: LocalStorage password session utilities handling create/get/clear plus validation and expiry checks.
frontend/src/auth/PasswordSessionProvide: React context managing password sessions with unlock, lock, and auto‑rehydration logic.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Defines the main application layout with header controls, tabbed navigation, and footer.
frontend/src/components/BackendAvailabil: Shows a destructive badge when the backend is unavailable based on store state.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React error boundary that displays a fallback UI or default error screen on runtime errors.
frontend/src/components/HeaderDeviceCont: Displays printer connection status and a wake‑lock toggle using related hooks.
frontend/src/components/SerialTypeCounte: Renders print counters for label type prefixes with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/config/lockScreenConfig.ts: Provides lock‑screen password retrieval, allowing build‑time override via environment variable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for submitting print jobs, fetching history, and increasing print counts with backend availability checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Manages screen wake‑lock support, activation, persistence, and visibility‑based re‑acquisition.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode, accessibility styles, and form/button sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/printing/barcodePreview.ts: Generates a deterministic SVG barcode from input data by constructing a simple bar pattern without external libraries.
frontend/src/printing/cpclGenerator.ts: Builds CPCL command strings for test prints and full labels using layout settings, DPI conversions, and serial data.
frontend/src/printing/LabelPreview.tsx: React component that renders a live label preview with zoom controls and sample serial inputs, converting layout settings into pixel-based positions.
frontend/src/screens/LockScreen.tsx: Password entry screen that handles unlock attempts with validation, loading state, and automatic input focusing.
frontend/src/screens/PasswordSessionWiri: Displays a configuration error message with troubleshooting steps and a page refresh button.
frontend/src/services/printerService.ts: Zustand store managing printer connections, USB integration, CPCL sending, and test print generation.
frontend/src/services/usbCpclTransport.t: WebUSB-based utilities for detecting, connecting, and communicating with USB CPCL printers.
frontend/src/state/backendAvailabilitySt: Zustand store tracking backend availability with timestamps and functions to mark errors or recovery.
frontend/src/state/diagnosticsStore.ts: Zustand store tracking total scans, prints, errors, and per-type counters with increment helpers and persistence.
frontend/src/state/labelSettingsStore.ts: Zustand store for label settings with BigInt‑safe persistence, default layouts, and migration from older formats.
frontend/src/state/logStore.ts: Persistent log store that records timestamped info/warn/error messages, keeping the latest 500 entries.
frontend/src/state/printHistoryStore.ts: Persistent print history store with up to 1000 entries and a reprint helper using the printer service and log updates.
frontend/src/tabs/DevicesTab.tsx: UI for connecting to a printer via Bluetooth or USB, showing connection status and allowing test prints.
frontend/src/tabs/DiagnosticsTab.tsx: Diagnostics UI showing scan/print stats, history, logs, sound settings, and reprint actions.
frontend/src/tabs/LabelSettingsTab.tsx: Editor UI for label layout and mapping settings with import/export, preview, and validation features.
frontend/src/tabs/ScanPrintTab.tsx: React component handling two-step serial scanning, prefix detection, validation, and print job submission with printer integration.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Utility for detecting IC canister-stopped errors and providing user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsErrors.t: Parses backend errors for label settings updates and maps them to readable user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsImportEx: Handles export/import of label settings, including BigInt-safe serialization and migration from old formats.
frontend/src/utils/labelTypes.ts: Defines built‑in and custom label types and provides utilities for extracting and naming them.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and removing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, layout, plugins, and custom animations.
project_state.json: JSON document describing the project’s current build state, architectural notes, known issues, and feature list for an Android-based barcode/label printing system. Includes platform details, workflows, diagnostics, and problems to resolve in future development.
